A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Left the cinema disappointed with how the characters were treated\, Kylo Ren was the only character that felt like they matched and progressed from their appearance in episode 7. the plot is disjointed and opens alot of B and C plots that server no purpose\, too many plot holes. visually there are some excellent shots...the hyper space scene . Excited to see how this story will fit into the saga once the next instalment drops
